original_text:
You will roll them up like a robe;
    like a garment they will be changed.
But you remain the same,
    and your years will never end.”
korean_text: 의복처럼 갈아입을 것이요 그것들은 옷과 같이 변할 것이나 주는 여전하여 연대가 다함이 없으리라 하였으나

sentences.original_text: You will roll them up like a robe;
like a garment they will be changed.
and your years will never end.
